mission.posting:
Once again our previously unknown hacker, #PLAYERNAME# has surprised us with another amazing victory! This time the hacker was pitted up against 'T4lisman' another relatively new hacker that made it very far in last year's tournaments! I think it's back to the drawing board for him!
With such an impressive solo act from #PLAYERNAME#, only a couple of questions remains for this hacker. How is he going to perform in the team stages later on and Who are his team members going to be?
